Premium Templates!

contact card

A one page contact card with a fixed left sidebar.

A modern and dark landing page with a fixed left sidebar and a scrolling right column with cards to your projects and contact info.

blog - magazine

A super cool and modern brutalist website.

This stunning site is made with Tailwind CSS and Alpine.js and includes a Landing page 2 different tipes of blog posts an about and is 100% responsive!

documentation

A clean and modern documentation website template. .

A documentation with a landing page and a responsive sidebar that includes 2 pages, landing and one page with documentation layout. Ready to use components to use through the template, 100% responsive and it supports dark mode!

APP/EXTENSION

A landing page to showcase your app or extension features.

A modern black & white landing page with sections to list every feature of your app or extension with text and image. Includes an input, and CTA's to Play Store and App Store.

saas - agency

A modern SAAS template for your product or MVP.

The template has 5 responsive and modern pages with dark mode support according to user preferences an includes a hoome, blog, blog post about and contact pages and all of this is 100% responsive! .
